alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 29 at 11:47PM AKST until February 01 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...POSSIBLE SNOW FOR THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE... .Confidence has increased on an overrunning event which will bring warning level snow to the northern panhandle. Cold, dry, northerly winds will undercut warm moist air, resulting in snow accumulation for Skagway, Haines, and surrounding area. What is uncertain is how strong the northerly winds will push the band of snow southward. For Yakutat, convective snow showers will cause fast accumulating snow for a short time. ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough including downtown Haines and Skagway, Klukwan, and Haines and Klondike Highways. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow moisture content is expected to be lower, resulting in light, dry snow. Stronger, northerly winds following the event may result in reduced visibility and hazardous driving conditions from blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
